tool_description: API to get details about upcoming MCU productions.
title: MCU Countdown

api_list.name: Next MCU Production
api_list.description: Get details of the next MCU production including days until release, overview, poster URL, release date, title, and type.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: ISO formatted date to get MCU production details as of this date.

following_production.overview: Nick Fury and Talos discover a faction of shapeshifting Skrulls who have been infiltrating Earth for years.
following_production.title: Secret Invasion

api_list.name: Following MCU Production
api_list.description: Get details of the MCU production following the next one including days until release, overview, poster URL, release date, title, and type.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: ISO formatted date to get MCU production details as of this date.

body.overview: Nick Fury and Talos discover a faction of shapeshifting Skrulls who have been infiltrating Earth for years.
body.title: Secret Invasion
